title: Google Fi plans are getting price cuts, much more high-speed data, and other improvements
content:
To celebrate its sixth birthday, Google’s MVNO last year announced a new cheaper “Unlimited” offering. Google Fi is now updating several plans with some big, much-needed changes that make the service more competitive.

more…
